text: available) Abnormality of metabolism/homeostasis - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Decreased osteoclast count - Hydrocephalus - Osteopetrosis - Stillbirth - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
